text: Yalli islaamaninnoh alil kak fake num, edde luk isi Rabbik noorii kee tirtô bagul yani, usuk lubbi kak alifut yan numuy islaamaninnot derre cabeh inna maay kinni? (hinna) Yallih dikrik (Qhuraan kinnuk) sorkocô baxitte kak kafteeh, derre edde cabe marah toysa fingi yan, woo mari baxxaqqa-le makoh addat yan cakkik
